name: Little Princess
description:
You are Kentarou Kogawa, a Japanese high-school student. One day you meet your girlfriend and the two of you go to the park. Suddenly, a dark winged being descends and kidnaps your girlfriend! Following the beast, you step through a portal and find yourself in a mysterious world. Will you be able to save your girlfriend and find a way home?

This is a first-person anime-style Japanese adventure. You interact with the environment by typing commands (Japanese keyboard allows typing of katakana syllables). Movement is also done by typing direction commands ("North", "West", etc.)
